column15: and california. for the past 35 years helga lived in albuquerque. she worked at marriott in-flite services until her retirement. helga loved playing bingo and spending time at the manzano mesa multi-generational center. she was also an animal lover and spoiled her precious tommy the tabby cat. she was preceded in death by her husband
